hw2

Class Generator

  • java.lang.Object
    • hw2.Generator

  • public class Generator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class encapsulating a mechanism for producing new Dot objects for a game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Generator(int givenType)
      Constructs a Generator whose generate() method always returns a Dot of the given type.
      Generator(int numTypes, java.util.Random rand)
      Constructs a Generator that will create random Dots with types 0 through numTypes - 1, using the given Random instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Dot generate()
      Returns an instance of Dot according to this generator's rules (Random or fixed value).
      void initialize(Dot[][] grid)
      Initializes the given 2D array of Dot objects with values produced by this generator.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Generator

        public Generator(int givenType)
        Constructs a Generator whose generate() method always returns a Dot of the given type. (This method is intended for testing.)
        Parameters:
        givenType - type of Dot objects to be generated

      • Generator

        public Generator(int numTypes,
                 java.util.Random rand)
        Constructs a Generator that will create random Dots with types 0 through numTypes - 1, using the given Random instance.
        Parameters:
        numTypes - number of types of dots
        rand - random number generator to use

    • Method Detail

      • generate

        public Dot generate()
        Returns an instance of Dot according to this generator's rules (Random or fixed value).
        Returns:
        a new Dot object

      • initialize

        public void initialize(Dot[][] grid)
        Initializes the given 2D array of Dot objects with values produced by this generator.
        Parameters:
        grid - a 2D array to be initialized
